Author: paperklipp
Text: Hey, have to talked to anybody about the emotions that are causing these binges? Five years is a really long time to suffocate in the embrace of such a maladaptive coping mechanism. Anything that causes analgesic effects can be addictive though. Maybe itâ€™s time to give in to discomfort and face the emotional pain head on.

Author: sp00py13
Text: I'm so, so sorry for what you're going through right now. Reading this breaks my heart, because I am in a very similar situation. I've been struggling with binging, used to tell myself if I ever hit xx I'd kill myself, thinking that was such a high weight that I'd never even come close, but I went 25 pounds higher. I was obese. I've recently lost ~30 pounds and am restricting again now and over exercising. EDs suck, and I'm sorry that you're struggling. My DMs are always open
